summary.content: I’ve just switched over to the Movable Type publishing system. So far, so good. I can tell that there are many, many, many features available in this system that will make weblogging easier than the hand-rolled way. So far, I like it. I’m still working on configuration stuff and getting my templates set up, but besides that this is definitely a Good Thing™. We’ll see how this all goes…

content.source: I’ve just switched over to the [Movable Type]({{% wayback "http://www.movabletype.org" %}} "The awesome Movable Type publishing system") publishing system. So far, so good. I can tell that there are many, many, many features available in this system that will make weblogging easier than the hand-rolled way. So far, I like it. I’m still working on configuration stuff and getting my templates set up, but besides that this is definitely a Good Thing™. We’ll see how this all goes…
